TopicTitle: Having Problems with Kebal Konstructs and Kerbin Side Remastered

Articles.Content:
I'm using KSP 1.7.3, I've installed KK and KSR (+KSR Airports) manually but there is something wrong.
In the first place I can't see airports's markers on the map although when I aim on their locations (looking at the map on the mod's post) the airport name is displayed, meaning it is there, I can select different launch sites from SPH and run them but some sites have no runaway, others have it underground (I can see it because of the signal lights). Plus there's is a menù in tracking station that may be 'base boss' which once opened is completely bugged, finally every toolbar icon from KK is a white square

I use visual mods as EVE, Astronomer's Visual Pack (and Textures), KSP3 and Distant Objects, I also use Kopernicus 

Edited September 8, 2019 by RickyOri
